mapper.insert: insert into poolmasterstatus ( idx, addidx, masterid, mans, nowmans, status, members ) values ( poolmasterstatus_idx.nextval, #{addidx}, #{masterid}, #{mans}, #{nowmans}, #{status}, #{members} )
insert into poolmemberstatus ( idx, memberid, masterid, mans, nowmans, status, members ) values ( poolmasterstatus_idx.nextval, #{addidx}, #{masterid}, #{mans}, #{nowmans}, #{status}, #{members} )
